food.name: BANH MI PINCHOS
food.description: TOASTED BAGUETTE W/ A HOMEMADE CHICKEN LIVER PATE & BUTTER SPREAD, SHREDDED CHICKEN, VIETNAMESE PICKLES, CILANTRO & A COATING OF PARMESAN CHEESE

food.name: GREEN CURRY QUESADILLAS

food.name: PANDAN CHICKEN BITES

food.name: CRISPY PORK BELLY

food.name: BUTTER-SAUTEED OKRA
food.description: OVER A FRENCH-STYLE EGGPLANT & SAMBAL PUREE, TOPPED W/ BRIK CRISPS & A CILANTRO-AIOLI

dessert.name: SPICED BANANA BEIGNETS
